item.title: 全球最大矿业公司难以实现巨额并购
item.description: 力拓与嘉能可的合并尝试失败，再次提醒人们矿业领域的巨额交易难以达成。【原文：A failed attempt to combine Rio Tinto and Glencore is a reminder that mega deals in mining are hard to achieve.】

item.title: 亚马逊和谷歌宣布巨额支出，时机选择不当
item.description: 美国超大规模企业宣布大幅增加资本支出，华尔街对此表示怀疑。【原文：US hyperscalers announced huge expansions in capex, which Wall Street greeted with suspicion】

item.title: 政治因素正削弱人们对部分亚洲"小老虎"的乐观预期
item.description: 在印度尼西亚、菲律宾和泰国，随着政治因素的介入，人们对经济的信心正逐渐让位于日益增长的忧虑。【原文：In Indonesia, the Philippines and Thailand, confidence in the economy is giving way to growing angst as politics gets in the way.】

item.title: 本周华尔街抛售演变成恐慌性抛售
item.description:
焦虑并非由单一诱因引发，而是源于持续不断的负面消息不断加剧。

【原文：

Rather than a single trigger, anxiety has been stoked by a steady drumbeat of negative news.

】

item.title: 莱茵金属因分析师会计变更困惑而受挫
item.description: 莱茵金属股份公司本周股价光环稍显黯淡，因会计准则变更引发的困惑削弱了市场对其盈利的预期——这家欧洲近年表现最佳的大型股公司之一。【原文：Rheinmetall AG’s stock market halo slipped a little this week as confusion over an accounting change tempered expectations for earnings at one of Europe’s best-performing largecaps of recent years.】

item.title: 美银哈特内特称中盘股是美国中期选举前的最佳选择
item.description: 美国银行策略师指出，在中期选举前夕，美国中小盘股是最佳投资选择，因为科技巨头正失去吸引力。【原文：US small- and mid-cap stocks are the best bets ahead of midterm elections as technology heavyweights lose their appeal, according to strategists at Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: Telenet推迟债券发售，因市场担忧公司架构
item.description: 在市场动荡且投资者对其新公司架构存有疑虑之际，Telenet集团控股公司暂缓了新债券发行的计划。【原文：Telenet Group Holding NV is holding back on launching a new bond deal amid volatile markets and investor concern over its new corporate structure.】

item.title: 塔塔钢铁利润增长得益于利润率提升及印度强劲需求
item.description: 塔塔钢铁公司第三季度利润增长八倍，主要得益于印度业务强劲的需求和产量，这帮助这家钢铁制造商克服了成本上升的压力。【原文：Tata Steel Ltd.’s profit grew eight fold in the third quarter led by robust demand and output at its Indian operations that helped the steelmaker overcome rising costs.】

item.title: 智利通胀率自2021年以来首次跌破目标值
item.description: 智利上月年度通胀率降至3%目标值以下，这是自2021年以来首次出现这种情况，标志着该国央行在多年持续承受消费价格冲击的压力下坚持不懈的政策取得成效。【原文：Chile’s annual inflation slowed just below the 3% target last month for the first time since 2021, marking a win for a central bank that persevered in the face of relentless consumer price shocks over the years.】

item.title: 曼德尔森创立的游说公司高管达成协议将其撤职
item.description: 据知情人士透露，游说公司Global Counsel的高层管理人员正处于交易的最后阶段，计划通过收购前美国大使彼得·曼德尔森持有的21%股份，将其从公司中撤出。【原文：Senior management at lobbying firm Global Counsel are in the final stages of a deal to remove former US ambassador Peter Mandelson from the business by buying out his 21% stake, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 托马斯·布拉沃在收购贷款中加入贷款人反叛乱条款
item.description: 托马斯·布拉沃公司近日在私募股权公司与贷款方之间的博弈中加码，通过启用贷款条款，在债权人反抗尚未萌芽之际便将其扼杀在萌芽状态。【原文：Thoma Bravo just raised the stakes in the tussle between private equity firms and their lenders, by deploying a loan provision to help smoke out creditor rebellions before they even begin.】

item.title: 印度ICICI顶级股票基金首席投资官加盟250亿美元规模的竞争对手
item.description: 据知情人士透露，ICICI Prudential资产管理公司股票投资联席首席投资官阿尼什·塔瓦克利已离职。这一举措反映出，随着全球玩家在该领域扩张，人才竞争日益激烈。【原文：Anish Tawakley, co-chief investment officer for equities at ICICI Prudential Asset Management Co., has quit the firm, according to people familiar with the matter, in a move that reflects intensifying competition for talent as global players expand in the sector.】

item.title: 报告盈利增长的美国企业比例创四年新高
item.description: 美国股市投资者有理由欢欣鼓舞——尽管标普500指数正迈向10月以来最糟糕的一周，但季度利润增长的企业比例已创下四年多来的新高。【原文：US equity investors have one reason to cheer as the S&P 500 heads for its worst week since October: The share of companies posting a rise in quarterly profits is the highest in over four years.】

item.title: 高盛与野村证券预测英镑兑欧元汇率将跌至三年低点
item.description: 高盛集团和野村控股的策略师预测，随着英国政治动荡加剧且降息迫在眉睫，英镑兑欧元汇率将跌至三年低点。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Nomura Holding Inc. strategists predict the pound will slide to a three-year low against the euro as UK political turmoil deepens and interest-rate cuts loom.】

item.title: 墨丘利公司将与塔塔贸易部门成立合资企业
item.description: 墨丘利能源集团与印度钢铁巨头塔塔集团的贸易营销部门达成合资协议，双方公司周五宣布。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group has entered into a joint venture with the trading and marketing arm of Indian steel giant Tata Group, both companies said on Friday.】

item.title: 凯雷集团利润超预期，首席执行官施瓦茨超额完成2025年目标
item.description: 凯雷集团在2025年实现了首席执行官哈维·施瓦茨设定的与费用相关的盈利和资产增长目标，同时公布的第四季度业绩超出了华尔街预期。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. exceeded the goals that Chief Executive Officer Harvey Schwartz had set for fee-related earnings and asset growth in 2025, while posting fourth-quarter results that surpassed Wall Street estimates.】

item.title: 特斯拉考虑在纽约、亚利桑那和爱达荷州扩建太阳能电池产能
item.description: 特斯拉公司并未坐等埃隆·马斯克提出的100吉瓦太阳能计划是否可行——而是已着手推进。据知情人士透露，该公司正在美国多地考察选址以启动太阳能电池生产，将几周前还被视为天方夜谭的计划转化为实际的产业布局。【原文：Tesla Inc. isn’t waiting around to see if Elon Musk’s 100-gigawatt solar ambition is feasible — it’s already acting on it. The company is evaluating multiple sites across the US to begin manufacturing solar cells, according to people familiar with the matter, turning what sounded like a moonshot just weeks ago into an active industrial push.】

item.title: 投资者追逐"抗AI"股票，科技股恐遭颠覆冲击
item.description: 随着科技股的下跌，一批新的股票赢家应运而生：那些业务无法被人工智能复制的公司。【原文：A new group of stock winners has emerged as technology shares slide: Companies with businesses that artificial intelligence can’t replicate.】

item.title: 欧盟就成瘾性设计风险向TikTok发出最后通牒
item.description: 字节跳动旗下的TikTok平台已收到欧盟警告，要求其彻底改造平台设计，因其令人上瘾的功能可能"损害用户身心健康"。【原文：ByteDance Ltd.’s TikTok has been warned by the European Union that it needs to overhaul the design of its platform over fears addictive features could “harm the physical and mental wellbeing of its users.”】

item.title: 特朗普正在重塑全球石油市场，埃克森美孚和雪佛龙渴望参与其中
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司和雪佛龙公司正将目光投向与欧佩克相关的国家，包括全球部分地缘政治风险最高的热点地区，以扩大生产规模。特朗普总统强硬的外交政策为它们达成协议提供了助力。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp. are setting their sights on expanding production in nations tied to OPEC, including some of the world’s riskiest geopolitical hotspots, as President Donald Trump’s assertive foreign policy helps them strike deals.】

item.title: 英伟达引领的芯片热潮将使该行业迈入万亿美元规模
item.description: 今年，半导体行业收入将首次突破万亿美元大关，这主要得益于人工智能的发展以及计算机芯片在经济各个领域的广泛应用。【原文：The semiconductor industry will reach $1 trillion in revenue this year for the first time ever, fueled by artificial intelligence and the spread of computer chips to virtually every part of the economy.】

item.title: 动量交易遭遇历史性回撤，价值轮动浪潮中承压
item.description: 多年来，在股市中追逐上涨势头一直是制胜策略。但过去一周，这一策略已然失效。【原文：For years, chasing momentum on the stock market has been a winning strategy. It’s come asunder in the past week.】

item.title: 津巴布韦赢得国际货币基金组织监督协议，迈出清偿拖欠款项的关键一步
item.description: 津巴布韦经过多年与国际货币基金组织的谈判，已获得一项为期10个月的工作人员监督计划，这是清偿数十亿美元拖欠债务的关键一步。【原文：Zimbabwe, after years of talks with the International Monetary Fund, has secured a 10-month staff-monitored program, a crucial step toward clearing billions of dollars in debt arrears.】

item.title: 金田公司称黄金价格上涨推动利润近乎翻三倍
item.description: 金田有限公司表示，由于受益于黄金价格创纪录的上涨，该公司去年利润可能增长近三倍。【原文：Gold Fields Ltd. said profit last year likely almost tripled as the miner benefited from bullion’s record-breaking rally.】

item.title: 法国香槟与香水因特朗普关税政策遭受重创
item.description: 去年年底，法国对美出口的香槟、香水等标志性产品出现下滑，主要受到特朗普总统加征关税和美元走弱的拖累。【原文：France’s exports to the US of signature products including champagne and perfume slumped at the end of last year, weighed by President Donald Trump’s tariffs and a weaker dollar.】

item.title: IPTO增资将确保重大电力项目顺利推进，首席执行官表示
item.description: 希腊电网运营商IPTO董事长兼首席执行官马努索斯·马努萨基斯表示，该公司将利用即将进行的10亿欧元增资推进重大国内及国际项目。【原文：Greek power grid operator IPTO will use a coming €1 billion capital increase to advance major domestic and international projects, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Manousos Manousakis said.】

item.title: 巴西造纸大亨以慈善新意力推摄影项目
item.description: 巴西亿万富翁大卫·费弗最广为人知的身份是造纸巨头苏扎诺集团的掌舵人。这家家族企业可追溯至一个多世纪前，如今他正将管理才能投入一项新颖的慈善事业：当代摄影。【原文：Brazilian billionaire David Feffer is best known for helming pulp and paper empire Suzano SA, a family-run industrial group that traces its roots back more than a century. Now he’s applying his executive chops to a novel philanthropic venture: contemporary photography.】

item.title: 欧洲基础设施建设计划或适得其反，合伙人集团称
item.description: 欧洲一家大型私募股权公司指出，欧洲在电网和数字网络等关键基础设施领域追求主权控制权，可能导致该行业资产价格持续上涨，形成不可持续的增长态势，因为资金仍在持续涌入。【原文：Europe’s quest for sovereignty in critical infrastructure like power grids and digital networks risks unsustainable asset-price growth in the sector as cash continues to pour in, according to one of Europe’s largest private equity firms.】

item.title: 波兰考虑发行美元债券，此前创纪录发行日元债券
item.description: 据一位高级政府官员透露，波兰正考虑在第一季度再次进行国际债券发售，继创纪录发行日元债券后，此次将瞄准美元债券市场。【原文：Poland is considering another international debt sale during the first quarter, eyeing a dollar bond after its record issue of yen-denominated notes, according to a senior government official.】

item.title: PB Fintech据称在接触投资者后重启10亿美元融资计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，PB Fintech Ltd.在完成与现有股东及潜在投资者的磋商后，预计将重启一项因股东反对而暂停的重大融资计划。【原文：PB Fintech Ltd., is expected to revive a major fundraising plan that had been paused over shareholder pushback, after completing consultations with existing shareholders and prospective investors, according to people familiar with the matter.】
